mapper.select: select product_id,product_name,user_name, price, description,image,ranking,brand_name,status,update_time from product where product_id = #{product_id} and status = '1'
select count(1) from product where status = '1'
select count(1) from product where status = '1' and brand_name = #{brand_name}
select count(1) from product where status = '1' and (brand_name like #{brand_name} or product_name like #{product_name})
select count(1) from product where status = '1' and user_name = #{user_name}
mapper.delete: update product set status = '0' where product_id = #{product_id}
